¢runch

Free your grocery budget

Almond milk $2 off—sweet deal right? Think again, it’s a terrible deal for your budget. ¢runch rates almond milk D grade food because you'd have to pay $13 to get a meal's worth of calories

What is a better deal? Whole milk! It provides a meal's worth of calories for only $0.90

Slash your grocery bill and join the movement. ¢runch was inspired by the Mr Money Mustache blog
